Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server

Class Server

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.Server
public class Server extends Object
Represents the server.

    Given a client connection, if it isn't already part of a lobby, then it simply gets removed from the waiting connections (a list of all those connections which are not already part of a lobby).
    List<Lobby>
    getActiveGames()
    Returns the list of active lobbies currently open on the server.

    Returns the list of banned nicknames (no one can choose these nicknames as their name).

    Get each player nickname, whether the player is on the server waiting connection list, or he is in a lobby.

    Manage a given lobby: if the number of players in the lobby is acceptable (the lobby is full), the game starts.

  • Constructor Details

    • Server

      public Server(int serverPort) throws IOException
      //@param serverPort the port to assign to the server, passed via terminal argument.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs when the server is getting created.

  • Method Details

    • deregisterConnection

      public void deregisterConnection(ClientConnection c)
      Given a client connection, if it isn't already part of a lobby, then it simply gets removed from the waiting connections (a list of all those connections which are not already part of a lobby). Otherwise, the lobby containing the given connection gets closed.
      Parameters:
      c - the client connection to unregister from the server.

    • handleLobbyState

      public void handleLobbyState(Lobby lobbyToHandle, ClientConnection connectionToMove)
      Manage a given lobby: if the number of players in the lobby is acceptable (the lobby is full), the game starts.
      Remove the connection which joined the lobby from the server 'waiting connections' list.
      Parameters:
      lobbyToHandle - the lobby whose state has to be handled.
      connectionToMove - connection on the server waiting connection list which joined the given lobby.

    • run

      public void run() throws IOException
      Run the server and create new server client connections when new clients connect.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs when closing the socket.

    • getConnectedPlayersName

      public Set<String> getConnectedPlayersName()
      Get each player nickname, whether the player is on the server waiting connection list, or he is in a lobby.
      Returns:
      a set of strings containing players nicknames of the players which are connected to the server.

    • addGameLobby

      public void addGameLobby(Lobby newLobby)
      Adds to the list of lobbies a new lobby.
      Parameters:
      newLobby - the new lobby which has to be added to the active ones.

    • getActiveGames

      public List<Lobby> getActiveGames()
      Returns the list of active lobbies currently open on the server.
      Returns:
      the list of active lobbies currently open on the server.

    • newWaitingConnection

      public void newWaitingConnection(ClientConnection connection)
      Adds a brand new connection to the waiting connections.
      Parameters:
      connection - the connection of the client which has just joined the server.

    • getBannedNicks

      public String[] getBannedNicks()
      Returns the list of banned nicknames (no one can choose these nicknames as their name).
      Returns:
      the list of banned nicknames.
